snippet: Two editors and a writer who left after a shake-up at the magazine last month will help develop long-form journalism at The Huffington Post.
abstract: Editors Greg Veis and Rachel Morris, along with writer Jonathan Cohn, all formerly with The New Republic, join The Huffington Post.
lead_paragraph: Two editors and a writer who left after a shake-up at the magazine last month will help develop long-form journalism at The Huffington Post.

headline.main: Three From The New Republic Join The Huffington Post
headline.print_headline: Three From New Republic Join the Huffington Post
